tool_description: With the help of Natural Language Processing, detect the emotion of your tweet or text.
name: Emotion Detector
title: Emotion Detector

api_list.name: EmotionDetector
api_list.description: This endpoint will require a text in a string format and predict an emotion of the text.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://emotion-detector1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "emotion-detector1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://emotion-detector1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "emotion-detector1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
